1.0.1.name: wordpress/genesis-post-navigation
1.0.1.description:
This plugin adds a previous and next post links on a single post in a conventional way. This plugin creates a new Genesis settings page (Genesis Post Navigation) that allows you to Customize the post navigation colors and to navigate posts within category.

Requires the Genesis framework.

Animations: On mouseover the previous and next links can travel from north pole to south pole :) But, I put just 20px.

Check plugin demo here

We really thank Andrew Norcross. We get color selection options from Andrew Norcross's plugin Genesis design pallete.
